Class CardValue

java.lang.Object
  CardValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<CardValue>
public class CardValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CardValue>

Objects of this class can be used to represent the values for standard playing cards (JOKER, ACE through KING).

Version:
1.0, 03/23/2004
Author:
Jeff Mickel

Returns:

compareTo

public int compareTo(CardValue that)
Compares this card value with another card value and returns their difference. ACE is considered high.
